headline: Enterprise Software Extinction Via AI Exaggerated, Their Stocks Becoming Incredibly Cheap
summary: Enterprise software is not facing extinction from generative AI. Click here to read more about how incumbents are adapting and leveraging AI themselves.

headline: JMP Securities Reiterated ‘Market Outperform’ Rating on ServiceNow, Inc. (NOW) With $1,300 PT
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is included in our list of the 11 Best Rebound Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. JMP Securities reiterated its ‘Market Outperform’ rating on ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) on August 4, 2025, with a $1,300 price target. The sentiment boost is attributed to growing confidence in the company’s AI Control Tower and […]
